seo.title: Home
seo.description: Tina is a content management platform, with a content management API and frontend toolkit to rapidly prototype your own CMS.

blocks.headline: Content editing for modern teams
blocks.subline: Tina is an open-source content UI that supports visual editing

items.headline: Store Your Content Anywhere
items.subline: Tina can connect to any API that stores content such as GitHub, a headless CMS, 3rd-party APIs, or even the file system.

items.headline: Visual Editing
items.subline: Most CMSs feel like GUI on a database. Tina gives your team a contextual, intuitive experience.

items.headline: Built for the JAMstack
items.subline: Tina is designed for the JAMstack and currently works for React-based sites

items.headline: WYSIWYG With Full Developer Control
items.subline: Control what your team can and cannot do. Customize the editing experience for their level.

items.headline: Design Systems
items.subline: Allow your team to pick from your custom, predefined components to build pages.

items.headline: Ship Content Faster
items.subline: Reduce your time-to-market and No need to rely on developers to make content changes.

browser.headline: Edit with Tina
browser.text: Connect to the single source of truth for you data

items.headline: Headless CMSs
items.subline: Connect to a headless CMS for a better content editing experience

items.headline: Git Repo
items.subline: Connect to the GitHub API with the Tina GitHub pluing

items.headline: 3rd Party API
items.subline: Store your content in Airtable, Google Sheets, or any data source

blocks.headline: Explore the *Tina ecosystem*
blocks.subline: More than just a headless CMS, Tina has all the tools for building web experiences for interdisciplinary teams.
